name: SciPy India
description: International conference on Python for education and scientific computing.

name: IEEE Indicon
description: The 15th IEEE India Council International Conference.

name: FunctionalConf
description: Bring together the growing community of functional programmers under one roof.

name: Devops Days India
description: Devopsdays is a worldwide series of technical conferences covering topics of software development, IT infrastructure operations, and the intersection between them.

name: ExpertTalks
description: ExpertTalks invites practitioners from the software community to share experiences, insights and opinions on the technological innovations driving modern businesses.

name: Data Hack Summit
description: India's most advanced conference on Aritificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning and IoT.

name: Grace Hopper Conference India
description: The Grace Hopper Celebration India is Asia's largest gathering of women technologists. It is produced by AnitaB.org and presented in partnership with ACM India.

name: ReactFoo
description: A conference on React, alternatives to React, React Native and front-end engineering

name: Processing Community Day
description: Processing Community Day (PCD) is a day to celebrate and explore art, code, and diversity around the world, conducted by Processing community

name: RubyConf India
venue: Resort Rio and Club Rio Royale, Goa
description: A global event complementing other RubyConf events across the world. This year it's a single track 2 day event, focused on the Language, Framework and Tools

name: Pragma IIITA
venue: Indian Insitute of Information Technology, Allahabad
description: Pragma is premier student design and developers’ conference held at IIIT-Allahabad. Attracting some of the best student developers from across India, Pragma is a 3 day extravaganza featuring a hackathon, workshops and numerous talks.

name: GopherCon
description: Go conference in India. Go is an open source project developed by a team at Google and many contributors for the open source community

name: JSFoo
description: The second Pune edition of India’s premier JavaScript conference
